nutrition.title: Share of Energy

indicators.indicator: Macronutrient share of usual energy intakes

nutrition.comments: The macronutrients share of usual energy intakes is in line with the WHO population goals with a rather low content of fat in the diet, and a very high contribution of carbohydrates.

indicators.indicator: Consumption of groundnuts in g/kg body weight/day over 2 days in consumers only
indicators.comments: The macronutrients share of usual energy intakes is in line with the WHO population goals with a rather low content of fat in the diet, and a very high contribution of carbohydrates.
